mapper.select:
SELECT s.id server_id,s.server_name, w.id, w.work_name, w.work_server_type_id, w.is_sea, w.is_sea_inner, w.is_sea_inner_state, w.is_sea_out, w.is_sea_out_state, w.is_air, w.is_air_inner, w.is_air_inner_state, w.is_air_out, w.is_air_out_state, w.sort, w.valid FROM sys_worktype w LEFT JOIN sys_server_type s on w.work_server_type_id = s.id WHERE w.valid = 1 AND s.id in
#{item}
